tgt_original: buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca dehi me śaraṇatrayam ||190 ||
prathānaṃ śiṣyamekaṃ tu kṛtvā brūyādidaṃ vacaḥ |
mantraprayogamatulaṃ yena bhagnaṃ mahābalam |  mārasainyaṃ mahāghoraṃ śākyasiṃhādibhirvaraiḥ ||194 ||
sarvakarmakṛtārakṣya dhyāyāddhṛtkaṇṭhamūrddhasu |  vajramabjaṃ tathā cakraṃ hū āḥ om teṣu vinyaset ||197 ||  gandhāmbuvajrasanmuṣṭyā hū om āḥ evamāpaṭhan |
hṛcchiraḥ kaṇṭhamālabhya dadyātpuṣpādikaṃ kramāt ||198 ||  puṣpaṃ mūrdhni puro dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ gandhaṃ punarhṛdi |
tricalupānamantraḥ-om hrīḥ viśuddhadharma sarvapāpāni cāsya śodhaya sarvavikalpānapanaya hū |
sarvajñānāṃ kadā loke sambhavo jāyate na vā |  udumbarasyai(sye)
prāgudaṅmukhasaṃsthaistaiḥ khādayitvaiva prakṣipet |  gocarmamātrabhū lipte siddhiṃ śāntyādikāṃ diśet ||201 ||
tatsarvaṃ hi kṣayaṃ yāti dṛṣṭvā maṇḍalamīdṛśam ||205 ||
yena yūyaṃ jinaiḥ sarvaiḥ saputrairiha śāsane ||208 ||
sarve parigṛhītāḥ stha jāyamānā mahātmabhiḥ |  tā hi bhaviṣyatha ||209 ||
bodhicittaṃ na vai tyājyaṃ yadvajramiti mudrayā |
